meanings.definition: A very small arachnid that is related to ticks and spiders.
meanings.sent1: I saw some mites crawling on the leaf.
meanings.sent2: The mites infested the old mattress.
meanings.sent3: The mites decided to have a dance party on the picnic blanket.
meanings.sent4: The mites in the garden were like tiny acrobats on the plants.
meanings.sent5: The microscope revealed the intricate world of mites on the pet's fur.

meanings.definition: A very small amount or quantity.
meanings.sent1: She added mites of sugar to her tea.
meanings.sent2: There were mites of sand in his shoes after the beach.
meanings.sent3: The chef sprinkled mites of salt into the soup.
meanings.sent4: His savings were just mites compared to what he needed.
meanings.sent5: The artist used mites of paint to create a masterpiece on the canvas.
